North Korean state media said Wednesday that during his summit with President Trump , Kim Jong Un [V: had] described as urgent the need to make bold decisions on “ halting irritating and hostile military actions against each other . ”

North Korean state media said Wednesday that [ARGM-TMP: during his summit with President Trump] , [ARG0: Kim Jong Un] had [V: described] [ARG2: as urgent] [ARG1: the need to make bold decisions on “ halting irritating and hostile military actions against each other] . ”

North Korean state media said Wednesday that during his summit with President Trump , Kim Jong Un had described as urgent the need to [V: make] [ARG1: bold decisions on “ halting irritating and hostile military actions against each other] . ”
